453:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān,
453:8: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ||
453:9: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-tathāgatagarbho mahāmate kuśalākuśalahetukaḥ sarvajanmagatikartā pravartate naṭavadgatisaṃkaṭa ātmātmīyavarjitaḥ |
453:15: teṣāṃ copāttānāmindriyākhyānāṃ parikṣayanirodhe samantarānutpatteranyeṣāṃ svamativikalpasukhaduḥkhāpratisaṃvedināṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattisamāpannānāṃ caturdhyānasatyavimokṣakuśalānāṃ yogināṃ vimokṣabuddhirbhavatyapravṛtteḥ ||
453:16: aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ |
453:22: tato'calāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito daśasamādhisukhamukhamārgān pratilabhate |
453:25: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ ||
453:26: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ syāt |
453:29: mahāmate ayaṃ tathāgatagarbhālayavijñānagocaraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyavitarkadarśanānāṃ prakṛtipariśuddho'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām|
453:31: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn bodhisattvānadhiṣṭhāya tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabditaḥ saptabhirvijñānaiḥ saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya tathāgataviṣayo deśito na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānyatīrthakaratarkaviṣayo'nyatra mahāmate tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmarthapratiśaraṇānāṃ no tu yathārutadeśanāpāṭhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvānyatīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām |
453:32: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye'smiṃstathāgatagarbhālayavijñānaparijñāne yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
453:39: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram |
453:42: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat || 4 ||
453:43: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān,
453:45: yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema,
453:51: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
453:53: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ śāśvatocchedasadasaddṛṣṭivivarjito dṛṣṭadharmasukhasamāpattisukhavihāra āmukhībhavati yogayoginām |
453:54: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām ||
453:61: abhisaṃskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ kośakārakīṭakā iva svavikalpapariveṣṭitamatayo gatisamudrakāntāraprapatitā ghaṭiyantravannātipravartante |
453:66: tatra vikalpaḥ punarmahāmate yena nāma samudīrayati |
453:70: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yena samyagjñānena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāma bhāvīkaroti,
453:74: tathatāvyavasthitaśca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirābhāsagocarapratilābhitvātpramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratilabhate ||
453:75: sa pratilabhya pramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sarvatīrthyāpāyagatibhyo bhavati lokottaradharmagatisamavasṛtaḥ lakṣaṇaparicayānmāyādipūrvakāṃ sarvadharmagatiṃ vibhāvayan svapratyātmāryadharmagatilakṣaṇaṃ tarkadṛṣṭivinivṛttakautuko'nupūrveṇa yāvaddharmameghā bhūmiriti |
453:86: tatra nāma ca nimittaṃ ca parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ |
453:87: yaḥ punarmahāmate tadāśrayapravṛtto vikalpaścittacaittasaṃśabdito yugapatkālodita āditya iva raśmisahito vicitralakṣaṇasvabhāvo vikalpādhārakaḥ,
453:89: samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca mahāmate avināśatvātsvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpanno veditavyaḥ ||
453:92: eṣu mahāmate pañcasu dharmeṣu sarvabuddhadharmā antargatāḥ,
453:95: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pañcadharmāḥ-nimittaṃ nāma vikalpastathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca |
453:96: tatra mahāmate nimittaṃ yatsaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣākārarūpādilakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate tannimittam |
453:98: yena tannāma samudīrayati nimittābhivyañjakaṃ samadharmeti vā,
453:101: tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo'nupalabdhistattathālakṣaṇam |
453:102: mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ prajñaptaṃ vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam,
453:113: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvaśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca |
453:117: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā deśanāpāṭhe yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā atītā anāgatā vartamānāśca |
453:122: na ca mahāmate gaṅgānadīvālukāpramāṇatayā tryadhvakabuddhapramāṇatā bhavati |
453:125: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadṛśāsadṛśaṃ lokātiśayātikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
453:128: yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti nityānityābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ tīrthakarāśayakudṛṣṭiyuktānāṃ saṃsārabhavacakrānusāriṇāmudvejanārtham-kathamete udvignā bhavagaticakrasaṃkaṭādviśeṣārthino viśeṣamārabheranniti sulabhabuddhatvapradarśanārthaṃ na nodumbarapuṣpatulyastathāgatānāmutpāda iti kṛtvā vīryamārapsyante |
453:129: deśanāpāṭhe tu mayā vaineyajanatāpekṣayā udumbarapuṣpasudurlabhaprādurbhāvāstathāgatā iti deśitam |
453:130: na ca mahāmate udumbarapuṣpaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na drakṣyate |
453:134: svanayapratyavasthānakathāyāṃ mahāmate nirdiśyamānāyāṃ lokātiśayātikrāntā dṛṣṭāntā yuktāḥ kriyante'śraddheyatvāt |
453:139: kiṃ tu upamāmātrametanmahāmate kṛtaṃ yaduta gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatāḥ samā na viṣamā akalpāvikalpanataḥ |
453:140: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā mīnakacchapaśiśumāranakramahiṣasiṃhahastyādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti-saṃkṣobhyāmahe na veti nirvikalpāḥ svacchā malavyapetāḥ |
453:141: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ svapratyātmāryajñānagaṅgāmahānadībalābhijñāvaśitāvālukāḥ sarvatīrthakarabālamīnaparapravādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti |
453:144: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā pṛthivīlakṣaṇasvabhāvatvātpṛthivī,
453:146: na ca mahāmate pṛthivī dahyate tejodhātupratibaddhatvādanyatra bālapṛthagjanā vitathatāpatitayā saṃtatyā dahyamānāṃ kalpayanti,
453:149: tadyathā mahāmate nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ vālukā apramāṇāḥ,
453:150: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ raśmyāloko'pramāṇaḥ sattvaparipākasaṃcodanamupādāya sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu prasarpyate tathāgataiḥ |
453:151: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā na vālukāsvabhāvāntaramārabhante,
453:153: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saṃsāre na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ,
453:155: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā apakṛṣṭā api na prajñāyante,
453:157: mahāmate evameva tathāgatānāṃ jñānaṃ sattvaparipākayogena na kṣīyate na vardhate,
453:159: śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām |
453:161: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā niṣpīḍyamānā ghṛtatailārthibhirghṛtatailādivirahitāḥ,
453:162: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
453:164: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake,
453:165: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate |
453:169: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate |
453:173: mahāmatirāha-tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ saṃsaratām,
453:179: adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā |
453:188: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu bhagavān,
453:189: deśayatu me sugatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām |
453:194: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
453:195: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ |
453:197: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante |
453:200: yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ |
453:201: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante |
453:204: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi |
453:206: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam |
453:207: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām |
453:209: asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ |
453:210: tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarmahāmate anubhūtasukhaduḥkhahetusahitaḥ pravartate nivartate ca catasṛbhirvāsanābhiḥ saṃmūrcchitaḥ |
453:212: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ |
453:216: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante |
453:217: tatkathaṃ bālaiḥ kṣaṇikārthe vikalpyate ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃdhābhāṣyakuśalaiḥ ?
453:218: punarapi mahāmatirāha-yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā-ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti |
453:228: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ |
453:229: lokottaratamāḥ punarmahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpamātragrahaṇātsvacittadvayāvabodhādapravṛttervikalpasya upādānagrahaṇābhāvātsvacittarūpalakṣaṇānabhiniveśāddānapāramitā sarvasattvahitasukhārthamājāyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramayogayoginām |
453:234: yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ,
453:237: tatra prajñāpāramitā yadā svacittavikalpābhāvādābuddhipravicayātprativicinvan antadvaye na patati āśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakarmavināśataḥ,
453:247: utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na vai deśemi bāliśān |
453:249: sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam |
453:252: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate || 13 ||
453:259: gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim |
